name: MIS Current Offenders MAPPA Levels
description: Returns MAPPA levels of current prisoners

dataset.name: Query 1
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_ALERT.ALERT_DESCRIPTION, BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_ALERT AT_ALERT, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_ALERT_EXPIRY_DATE, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_ALERT AT_OFFENDER_ALERT WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (AT_ALERT.ALERT_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.ALERT_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.ALERT_EXPIRY_DATE_SK = AT_ALERT_EXPIRY_DATE.DATE_SK (+)) AND (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS') AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_STATUS = 'O') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y') AND AT_ALERT.ALERT_CODE_NK IN ('P0', 'P1', 'P2', 'P3') AND (CASE WHEN AT_ALERT_EXPIRY_DATE.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_ALERT_EXPIRY_DATE.DAY_DATE ELSE NULL END IS NULL OR CASE WHEN AT_ALERT_EXPIRY_DATE.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_ALERT_EXPIRY_DATE.DAY_DATE ELSE NULL END > BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, ALERT_DESCRIPTION, BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)
